items.title: Thomson Reuters Announces Voting Results for Election of Directors
items.content_html: TORONTO , June 5, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Thomson Reuters (TSX/Nasdaq: TRI) today announced the voting results for the election of the company's Board of Directors at its annual meeting of shareholders held in-person yesterday. items.title: Thomson Reuters Reports Second-Quarter 2025 Results
items.content_html: TORONTO , Aug. 6, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Thomson Reuters (TSX/Nasdaq: TRI) today reported results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025 :      Good revenue momentum continued in the second quarter Total company revenues up 3% / organic revenues up 7% Organic revenues up 9% for the "Big 3"

items.title: Thomson Reuters Announces $1.0 Billion Share Repurchase Program
items.content_html: TORONTO , Aug. 15, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Thomson Reuters (TSX/Nasdaq: TRI), a global content and technology company, today announced that it plans to repurchase up to $1.0 billion of its shares.
